title: Shuffling Arrays with Fisher-Yates Algorithm
description: In this lab, we will explore the Fisher-Yates algorithm and its implementation in JavaScript. Specifically, we will be focusing on shuffling arrays using this algorithm. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how the Fisher-Yates algorithm works and how it can be used to randomize the order of elements in an array.

meta.title: Mastering Array Shuffling with the Fisher-Yates Algorithm
meta.description: Discover the power of the Fisher-Yates algorithm and learn how to efficiently shuffle arrays in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, array shuffling, javascript practice online, coding, javascript lab, fisher yates algorithm, javascript tutor, programming

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 使用费雪-耶茨算法对数组进行洗牌
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索费雪-耶茨算法及其在JavaScript中的实现。具体来说，我们将重点关注如何使用该算法对数组进行洗牌操作。在本实验结束时，你将更好地理解费雪-耶茨算法的工作原理，以及如何使用它来随机化数组中元素的顺序。

meta.title: 掌握费雪-耶茨算法进行数组洗牌
meta.description: 探索费雪-耶茨算法的强大功能，并学习如何在JavaScript中高效地对数组进行洗牌。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript练习, 数组洗牌, 在线JavaScript练习, 编码, JavaScript实验, 费雪-耶茨算法, JavaScript教程, 编程

verify.name: 在Zsh历史记录中验证Node命令
